title: ContextSuite Semantic Event Traits
description: Schema for user traits associated with an identify or group event.

id.description: User's unique identifier within the external system.

social_security_nr.description: Social security number (handle with care due to PII).

social_security_nr_family.description: Family social security number (handle with care due to PII).

avatar.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

company.description: Company the user is associated with.

gender.description: Gender of the user. Expected values can include 'Male', 'Female', 'Transgender', 'Non-Binary', 'Gender Queer', 'Gender Fluid', 'Gender Neutral', 'Intersex', 'Gender Non-Conforming', 'Gender-Expansive', 'Agender', 'Gendervoid', 'Bigender', 'Omnigender', 'Pangender', 'Two-spirit', 'Trans', or 'No Response', often mapped from an internal Enum.

salutation.description: Salutation for the user (e.g., Mr., Ms.).

employees.description: Number of employees in the user's company.

plan.description: Service plan the user is subscribed to.

total_billed.description: Total amount billed to the user.

logins.description: Number of times the user has logged in.

address.description: User's address details as a key-value map (e.g., street, city, postalCode).
